oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Existenzgründungen in der Landwirtschaft
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Thomas, Dr. Frieder
Weiland, Iris
Schmidt, Prof. Dr. Götz
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Policy environments and social economy
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Despite the substantial structural change in agriculture there is interest to run an organic farm by highly qualified people, who do not come from a farm. The process of starting a farm is complex and requires a high intensity of consulting and coaching. The main topics are: How to find a suitable object, conception/planning of the farm, financing, age safety, special legal questions of taxes and inheritance.
